title: Hario Ceramic Coffee Mill Mini-Slim Plus MSS-1DTB
description: The Mini-Slim+ is a great grinder for both beginners and pros! Light-weight and with an easy-to-grip shape, the Ceramic Coffee Mill Mini Slim + is ideal to use on the go! This compact ceramic burr hand grinder is perfect for travel or home use, and is an upgrade from the original Mini-Slim with a newly designed handle and shaft coupling for better traction. This grinder can hold coffee beans for up to 2 cups of coffee, making it ideal for enjoying coffee with a smaller number of people. The ceramic burr transfers less friction heat to your beans, resulting in a better brew. All of our manual coffee grinders use burrs made of ceramic - conical ceramic burrs transfer less heat and shave coffee beans versus cracking them like blade grinders. This process also provides a more consistent grind that can easily be adjusted and set for repeat use. Item Number: MSS-1DTB Size: W150×D72×H220mm Capacity: Coffee Grounds 24g Material Washer, Hopper Shaft Cover, Pin, Grind Adjustment Nut: Nylon Shaft

title: CHEMEX® FP-2 – Unfolded Half Moon Bonded Filters
description: What makes CHEMEX® Bonded Filters the real deal? Chemex® filters are 20-30% heavier than competitive brands and remove even the finest sediment particles as well as the undesirable oils and fats. The formulation of the filter permits the proper infusion time by regulating the filtration rate - not too slow, not too fast. Good infusion of the coffee grounds (as in brewing and steeping tea) gives coffee a richer flavor while at the same time making possible precise fractional extraction filtering out the undesirable components which make coffee bitter by allowing only the desirable flavor elements of the coffee bean to pass through. The Chemex® filter is folded into a cone shape, exactly as in laboratory techniques. This assures uniform extraction since the water filters through all the grounds on its way to the apex of the cone. The Chemex® filter is guaranteed not to burst under the weight of the liquid during filtration, and not to break when lifting out the grounds. 100 filters per p

title: Cafetto Espresso Clean 1kg
description: Recommended for Coffee / Espresso Machine / Equipment Cleaner A rapidly soluble and free-rinsing formulation that removes coffee oils, grounds and stains. Improves flavour and aroma of espresso. Leaves no trace of odour. A measuring scoop is included in 1kg jar for accurate dosing. Certifications Directions PROCEDURE TO BACKFLUSH EACH DELIVERY GROUP Remove coffee filter from group handle, and replace with blind filter. For daily cleaning add 1 level scoop of Espresso Clean ® into the group handle and insert as if brewing espresso. If the machine is cleaned less often, use 2 level scoops. Start cycle and allow to run for 10 seconds to dissolve cleaner. Stop cycle and allow to sit for 10 seconds. Start and stop cycle 4 more times - run for 10 seconds, stop for 10 seconds. Remove the group handle and rinse well under stream of water from delivery group. Turn off. Re-insert handle with blind filter, start and stop cycle 10 times - run for 5 seconds, stop for 2 seconds to ensure thorough ri

title: Cafetto Grinder Cleaner 450g
description: Recommended for Coffee Grinder Removes build-up of stale coffee residue and coffee odours. Reduces blockages between burrs and internal chambers. No grinder disassembly required. Cleans grinder burrs and casings to improve grinder performance and extend life of grinder burrs. Gluten free, 100% natural grain based proprietary formula - no binders or chemicals used in processing. Certifications Directions Empty all coffee from hopper. Pour one capful of Cafetto ® Grinder Clean into hopper. Run grinder to grind all Grinder Clean in hopper. Empty the grinder dosing chamber and brush out any dust with Pallo Grind Minder. To season burrs, repeat above process once with one capful of coffee beans. The grinder is now ready for use. Note: A small amount of dust may develop during grinding and is harmless. Wipe particulates from hopper, spout and doser. Video

title: Otis Oat Milk (Chocolate) 1L x 12
description: KEEN TO TRY? GET YOUR FIRST OTIS AT 25% OFF USING CODE " OTIS25" OR SUBSCRIBE AT 20% OFF. HURRY, NOW! Taste the freshness of quality Kiwi oats, made in New Zealand. Free from dairy, soy, nuts and vegan friendly. I'm Otis Oat M!lk, the Chocolate one. Made using 100% New Zealand oats and Fairtrade Certified Cocoa, I'm a naughty-but-nice plant based treat! High in calcium and fortified with vitamins D2, B2 and B12, I’m also a yummy source of dietary fibre . By adding me to checkout, you’re buying two 6 x 1 litre cartons. INGREDIENTS Water, oats (11%), sugar, rapeseed oil, cocoa (1.2%), minerals (calcium carbonate, calcium phosphates), salt, natural flavour, vitamins (D2, riboflavin, B12). Our Choc Oat M!lk contains 2.5% added sugar (sugar beet), the rest of the sugar content comes naturally from the oats. GENERAL INFORMATION I’m happy sitting in the cupboard for up to twelve months. Once I’m opened keep me refrigerated and use me within seven days. See top of package for best before date.

title: Kalea Espresso Coffee Machine with Glass Fridge and Cup Warmer
description: Kalea is the ultimate way of offering quality coffee. Get used to being able to offer a delicious menu of coffee drinks, all of them perfectly made, from the authentic Italian espresso to frothy cappuccino and latte macchiato, just to name a few. Kalea, from Necta: it’s Italian quality coffee at your fingertips. Features Highlight A compact machine delivering Espresso + Fresh Brew + Fresh Milk, espresso coffee and flat black coffee from the same Z4000 brewer, high-performance brewer, regulation of blades and a gear pump for milk. An appealing user interface enhancing the consumer experience and an entirely customizable 7” touch screen. Quick settings and easy diagnosis for the professionals. Easier access to the components and faster change of the parts, modular design of the internal of the machine and reduced maintenance costs. Specifications User interface: Capacitive 7” touch screen Number selection: Up to 10 selections per screenshot Number canisters: 3 Coffee brewer: Espresso Z40

title: Sanremo Cube V Yolk Yellow
description: LIMITED STOCKS. LOCAL DELIVERY, NO ADDITIONAL CHARGES. Introducing.... the CUBE When you choose Sanremo Coffee Machines, you are not just buying a professional tool or a piece of design: you are acquiring the key to enter our world of "coffee lovers". When you turn on a Sanremo, you turn on your passion for coffee. The perfect fit for everyone. Complete accessories kit comes with each CUBE. Which is your CUBE? CUBE V Technical Features 1.9L heat exchanger boiler stainless steel AISI 316 1.8L internal water tank Thermosiphon group with mechanical pre-infusion Vibration pump Boiler power 1500W/230Vac - 1300W/120Vac Energy Saving System WiFi connection with Web App Complete set of accessories for user experience Small machine, big impact The CUBE is our most compact coffee machine to date. But beneath its minimal exterior lies the technology and power you would expect from any Sanremo machine. Style, and serious substance. title: Bunn G Series VH Grinder
description: GVH-2, 220-240V 50/60HZ The BUNN G Series VH is a fast, efficient, precision coffee grinder, ideal for specialty cafés, and retail stores. The G-Series grinders are designed for the modern coffee aisle. Sleek curves and a stainless steel finish look right at home in upscale environments while offering users a precise grinding experience that feels unique. Reduces Need for Multiple Grinders Chute accommodates nearly every size and shape of container for coffee grounds: funnels, large and small bags, cans, cups, and more - allowing one grinder to perform the job of multiple grinders. The ergonomic design firmly grips the container, allowing users to operate the G-Series with both hands. Dial-in Precise Grinds Users have 340° of grind resolution on the “no-click” selection dial, giving them complete freedom when dialing-in their ideal grind particle size. Two decals are available for the dial cover: a particle size decal for upscale cafe and grocery settings, and an icon-based decal for s

title: Teisseire Herbs & Flowers Pandan Syrup 700ml
description: Perfect for creating drinks that offer the unique flavours of herbs and flowers. With a fragrance reminiscent of vanilla and a flavour that transports you straight to Southeast Asia, Mathieu Teisseire’s Pandan Syrup is a taste of the exotic within everyday reach. Known as annapurna in India and rampé in Sri Lanka, pandan is an aromatic plant that has been cultivated since ancient times. Its leaves are widely used, fresh or dried, in cooking and drinks – and even as a natural air freshener. When distilled into an essence and added as an extract, pandan gives a unique sensorial experience to desserts, ice cream, coffees and teas. It pairs particularly well with coconut. Enhance Your Water Add a dash to flavour your drink, then adjust to your taste. We prefer to add 1 splash of syrup to 7 of drink for ours. Use me in... Water, Cold Drinks, Alcohol, Hot Drinks. Storage Recommendation Preferably in a dry and cool place, away from heat and light sources. Ingredients Sugar, water, flavourings

title: Otis Oat Milk (Barista) 1L

I'm Otis Oat M!lk, the barista one. I'm the only oat m!lk made using Kiwi oats. I'm a thick and creamy oat m!lk created especially for a frothy finish, but I’m just as good on muesli and in smoothies too. title: Decaf Colombia 250g
description: SUBSCRIBE & KEY IN "JCBAG50" NOW TO ENJOY 50% OFF! Our new Decaf Colombian Medium Roast – just without all of the caffeine. This staple of coffee roasts has been decaffeinated using the Swiss Water Process Method – void of chemicals – a water process that uses hot water to plump up the beans and allow the caffeine to be gently extracted. This resulting coffee does not cup like a decaf! It is clean and bright, with full, lingering body. It possesses honey-like sweetness and pleasingly tart elements. It is full of complex flavor notes not usually found in decaffeinated coffees. Honey-like sweetness and pleasingly tart elements. *Swiss Water Process (SWP) is 100% chemical-free decaffeination. Cup Characteristics: Tart Fruit, Nutty, Dark Cocoa Varietal: Mixed

This staple of coffee roasts has been decaffeinated using the Swiss Water Process Method – void of chemicals – a water process that uses hot water to plump up the beans and allow the caffeine to be gently extracted. This resulting coffee does not cup like a decaf! It is clean and bright, with full, lingering body. It possesses honey-like sweetness and pleasingly tart elements. It is full of complex flavor notes not usually found in decaffeinated coffees. Honey-like sweetness and pleasingly tart elements. *Swiss Water Process (SWP) is 100% chemical-free decaffeination. Cup Characteristics: Tart Fruit, Nutty, Dark Cocoa Varietal: Mixed

title: Otis Oat Milk (Chocolate) 1L x 6
description: KEEN TO TRY? GET YOUR FIRST OTIS AT 25% OFF USING CODE " OTIS25" OR SUBSCRIBE AT 20% OFF. HURRY, NOW! Taste the freshness of quality Kiwi oats, made in New Zealand. Free from dairy, soy, nuts and vegan friendly. I'm Otis Oat M!lk, the Chocolate one. Made using 100% New Zealand oats and Fairtrade Certified Cocoa, I'm a naughty-but-nice plant based treat! High in calcium and fortified with vitamins D2, B2 and B12, I’m also a yummy source of dietary fibre . By adding me to checkout, you’re buying 6 x 1 litre carton. INGREDIENTS Water, oats (11%), sugar, rapeseed oil, cocoa (1.2%), minerals (calcium carbonate, calcium phosphates), salt, natural flavour, vitamins (D2, riboflavin, B12). Our Choc Oat M!lk contains 2.5% added sugar (sugar beet), the rest of the sugar content comes naturally from the oats. GENERAL INFORMATION I’m happy sitting in the cupboard for up to twelve months. Once I’m opened keep me refrigerated and use me within seven days. See top of package for best before date. ALLE

title: Twinings Earl Grey
description: A tea fit for an Earl! Legend has it that Earl Grey was developed especially for the 2nd Earl of England in the 1800s. It is light and aromatic with a distinctive citrus bergamot flavour. So sip and enjoy this delightful blend inspired by the Earl and you will feel like you have just stepped back in time.

title: Hario Cold Brew Coffee Bottle Kit (Basic)
description: Brews iced coffee with only ground coffee and water. Put ground coffee in the strainer, set it on the spout and slowly pour in water to brew. Leave in your refrigerator for about eight hours to brew. Before pouring, gently shake the bottle. Unplug the spout and serve. Please drink the coffee as soon as possible. After 1 - 2 days the taste will deteriorate, even when stored in a refrigerator. The basic kit includes: Hario Filter-in Coffee Bottle (5 cups / Brewed volume 650ml) 250g freshly roasted bag of coffee beans

title: Brazil 1kg
description: SUBSCRIBE & KEY IN "JCBAG50" NOW TO ENJOY 50% OFF! This coffee have the typical features of South Minas coffees and more. It has pronounced body and sweetness, excellent aroma and moderate acidity. The quality is controlled at all stages of production, from planting to harvesting, processing and shipment. The estate’s agronomists are trained to understand how growing techniques influence cup quality. Harvesting is staged according to the degree of maturation of the cherries. Processing is monitored throughout by means of samples taken at key operations like drying and grading. Quality control is performed by trained cuppers who run the farm’s coffee quality laboratory. The estate cuppers interact with traders to learn about coffee market requirements and consumption trends. Cup Characteristics : Honey, Nutty, Creamy Varietal: Yellow Bourbon

title: Ethiopia 1kg
description: SUBSCRIBE & KEY IN "JCBAG50" NOW TO ENJOY 50% OFF! Guji is famous in the coffee-growing region for its rich and volcanic soil. The high altitudes of 1600 - 1700 masl, bi-modal rainfall patterns and dry weather allow coffee to develop slowly and consistently. The coffee comes from smallholder farmers of Hambela Wamena with farms of less than 2.5 hectares and has gone through a natural process. Natural processing refers to drying the cherry together with the coffee - ultimately roasting and brewing causing the sugars and other compounds present in the cherry to ferment together with the seed, evolving into a cup of coffee with notes of floral, peach and strawberry. Cup Characteristics: Floral, Peach, Strawberry Varietal: Gibirinna 74110

title: CHEMEX Glass Mug 10 oz
description: The perfect balance of form and function Our 10 oz. CHEMEX ® Handblown Glass Mug brings the iconic elements of the CHEMEX ® Coffeemaker together for the perfect cup of coffee. Made from the same non-porous Borosilicate glass as our CHEMEX ® brewers, the mug ensures the natural flavor of your chosen coffee beans and nothing else. The CHEMEX ® mug makes a unique and beautiful addition to any coffee lover's collection. Dimension Details Capacity: 10oz Height: 4" Diameter: 3.5" Type: CCM-1

title: Sumatra 250g
description: SUBSCRIBE & KEY IN "JCBAG50" NOW TO ENJOY 50% OFF! Coffee has been grown in the Gayo Highlands of Sumatra since 1908 and is well known for its rich and complex flavour. Indonesia has a particular method of processing coffee, known as “wet-hulled”, but more accurately said as “giving basah”. Farmers remove the outer skin of the coffee cherries mechanically using a pulping machine. The beans, still coated with mucilage, are then stored for a day. The mucilage is washed off and the parchment coffee is partially dried for sale, retaining only 30% to 35% of the moisture content. Processors then hull the coffee in semi-wet state, which gives the beans a unique bluish-green appearance. This method reduces acidity and increases body, resulting in a classic Indonesian cup profile. Cup Characteristics: Green Apple, Molasses, Smooth Varietal: Typica, Ateng

title: Brazil 250g
description: SUBSCRIBE & KEY IN "JCBAG50" NOW TO ENJOY 50% OFF! This coffee have the typical features of South Minas coffees and more. It has pronounced body and sweetness, excellent aroma and moderate acidity. The quality is controlled at all stages of production, from planting to harvesting, processing and shipment. The estate’s agronomists are trained to understand how growing techniques influence cup quality. Harvesting is staged according to the degree of maturation of the cherries. Processing is monitored throughout by means of samples taken at key operations like drying and grading. Quality control is performed by trained cuppers who run the farm’s coffee quality laboratory. title: Sumatra 1kg
description: SUBSCRIBE & KEY IN "JCBAG50" NOW TO ENJOY 50% OFF! Coffee has been grown in the Gayo Highlands of Sumatra since 1908 and is well known for its rich and complex flavour. Indonesia has a particular method of processing coffee, known as “wet-hulled”, but more accurately said as “giving basah”. Farmers remove the outer skin of the coffee cherries mechanically using a pulping machine. The beans, still coated with mucilage, are then stored for a day. The mucilage is washed off and the parchment coffee is partially dried for sale, retaining only 30% to 35% of the moisture content. Processors then hull the coffee in semi-wet state, which gives the beans a unique bluish-green appearance. This method reduces acidity and increases body, resulting in a classic Indonesian cup profile. Cup Characteristics: Green Apple, Molasses, Smooth Varietal: Typica, Ateng

title: Eureka Helios 65 Black Commercial Coffee Grinder
description: Discover the new Commercial Coffee Grinder - Helios 65. A ray of light in the world of pro grinding. Featuring extremely high productivity and modern design, its simplifies the barista's everyday life thanks to even faster maintenance and a new multifunctional touch display. Three grinding classes to choose from: Turkish Espresso Moka Key Features New multi-color touch display with: 3 programmable doses and "Extra Dose" mode, Maintenance alert customised for burrs type, Possibility to activate the mode of dose pre-selection after each erogation. Transparent bean hopper (1.2kg) with security system. Stepless micrometric regulation system (patented by Eureka), with larger knob and vertical measurement scale for a greater ease of use. ACE System conceived to prevent the presence of clumps and eliminate the electrostatic charge of ground coffee. Adjustable outlet chute, for better coffee dispensing, and removable, for extreme ease of cleaning. All-purpose fork for "Hands-Free" operations,

title: Teisseire The Fruits Yuzu Lemon Syrup 700ml
description: Perfect for creating drinks that offer the unique the fruits. Mathieu Teisseire Yuzu Syrup perfectly recreates the cool, refreshing flavour of this trend-setting fruit. With its intense, zesty taste and robust, fragrant aroma, this syrup adds a tart, citrus zing to your drinks. Elevate classic cocktails and mocktails, boost teas and soda, or add body to wine and beer with must-have flavour. Enhance Your Water Add a dash to flavour your drink, then adjust to your taste. We prefer to add 1 splash of syrup to 7 of drink for ours. Use me in... Water, Cold Drinks, Alcohol, Hot Drinks. Storage Recommendation Preferably in a dry and cool place, away from heat and light sources. Ingredients Glucose-fructose syrup, sugar, water, yuzu juice (4%), lemon juice from concentrate (3%), acid: citric acid, natural yuzu flavouring with other natural flavourings, colour: E150a Nutrition Typical Values For 100ml Energy (kj/kcal) 1445/340 Carbohydrates (g) 83 of which sugars (g) 75 Salt (g) 0

title: Hario Cafe Press U 600ml
description: A new edition to our coffee and tea presses! Simply add coffee grounds or tea leaves with boiling water, and push the filter down for delicious brewed coffee or tea. The press uses a metal mesh filter that is loose enough to allow small coffee particles to pass through making for a rich, full body. A variety of teas can also be brewed, from classic black teas to herbal teas. title: Drinkmate Sparkling Water & Soda Maker (Black)
description: Drinkmate is the USA's most versatile home carbonation device! Loved by mixologists and bartenders worldwide. Say goodbye to store-bought soda, and get sparkling! Drinkmate Sparkling Water and Soda Maker is the ONLY carbonation beverage maker in the world that allows you to carbonate ANY beverage easily within seconds. You can directly add tasty fizz to water, juices, iced tea or iced coffee, energy drinks, wine, cocktails, and even flat soda or beer. The possibilities are endless! Unleash your creativity in crafting healthy, and delicious drinks. title: MFC® Blue Milk Frother Cleaner
description: Recommended for use with acidic milk frother cleaner or descaler through the milk lines periodically to remove any scale build up in the lines. title: Drinkmate 60L CO2 Cylinder
description: Don't ever run out of bubbles! With spare cylinders, you don't have to ever worry about being stuck waiting for the deliveryman to bring you a full cylinder. Each cylinder comes fully filled, and contains 425g of Carbon Dioxide, which can make up to 60L of sparkling water. Our cylinders are compatible with most modern local home soda machines including Sodastream® (except Terra/DUO/ART models) and Aarke. If you've bought your machine from Australia or New Zealand, unfortunately it won't be compatible with cylinders in Singapore due to the difference in valve thread. All our cylinders are certified Food Grade, and approved for safety with USA DOT, TC Canada, and European TUV certifications. The food grade CO₂ inside your cylinder is filled locally in Singapore by certified gas suppliers. This way, we save you money, and reduce our carbon footprint!

This blend is specially crafted using Robusta Beans and Arabica Beans; giving off a unique full-bodied bittersweet taste with chocolatey, nutty and caramel tasting notes. Higher caffeine intake can help to improve your concentration and win the game just like a racer at Grand Prix, Monza. Cup Characteristics: Chocolate, Caramel, Hazelnut Coffee Roast Type: Dark Roast

title: Teisseire Le 0% Kids Apple Berrylicious Syrup 600ml
description: All the delicious flavour of our Sirops, without any sugar. A strong fruity taste of blackberry and blueberry with the juiciness of raspberry and strawberry, a light hint of redberry. Sweet, fruity and a well balanced blend of berries. 0% sugar, 100% taste! Enhance Your Water To be diluted with still or sparkling water or lemonade. One syrup—infinite possibilities! Add a dash to flavour your drink, then adjust to your taste. We prefer to add 1 splash of syrup to 12 of drink for ours. Use me in... Water, Cold Drinks, Alcohol, Hot Drinks. Ingredients Water, fruit juices from concentrates 10% (summer fruits 9%: blackberry 5%, wild strawberry 1,9%, elderberry 0,9%, redcurrant 0,5%, blackcurrant 0,4%, raspberry 0,3%; lemon), bulking agent: polydextrose, acid: citric acid, natural blackcurrant flavouring with other natural flavourings, thickener: xanthan gum, sweeteners: sucralose, steviol glycosides from Stevia, preservative: potassium sorbate. title: Teisseire Herbs & Flowers Black Tea Syrup 700ml

title: Drinkmate 60L CO2 Cylinder Refill (1 For 1 Exchange)
description: *Do select self collection at checkout to avoid additional shipping fees. Please ensure you have the EXACT amount of empty cylinders to exchange before ordering, or drivers will refuse delivery, and you will be required to pay additional $30 re-delivery fee. If you do not have an empty cylinder to exchange, or would like extras, please purchase them HERE. Made for soda lovers like you! Drinkmate Singapore's CO2 is filled locally to save you plenty! Our cylinders are compatible with Singapore Sodastream ® makers (except Terra/DUO/ART models), Aarke, and many others as well. Drop us a message if you're unsure! Recommended choice for Diabetics **, Keto & Sugar Reduction Lifestyle. title: Hario V60 Drip Kettle Buono 1.2L Matt Black VKB-120MB
description: Hario V60 kettle is very popular amongst baristas, coffeehouses and coffee lovers at home. It is unique and very reliable, that is why it is highly rated by coffee experts worldwide. Hario is known to manufacture and invent brilliant coffee equipment, so it is not an accident that the Buono drip kettle is highly rated. You will not come across many better kettles than the V60 kettle from Hario. What makes the Hario kettle great is a combination of things. Its classic and elegant design offers baristas and coffee experts at home to pour water like never before. It is not difficult to see that Hario put a lot of thought when designing the marvellous pour-over. The low-mounted spout and a high-mounted easy-to-grip handle, allows you to take total control of the flow-rate. For this reason the Hario V60 Buono Drip Kettle is ideally used with V60 dripper brewing method. If you are familiar with it, then you know how important it is to pour the hot water over the coffee in an even and steady

title: Mathieu Teisseire Syrup Pump (10ml)
description: Each pump is 10ml.

title: Nicaragua 1kg
description: SUBSCRIBE & KEY IN "JCBAG50" NOW TO ENJOY 50% OFF! For Limited Season. While stocks last. The Centroamericano H1 Natural originates from Finca La Virgen, Nicaragua. The coffee varieties - complemented by the farm’s 1,000 metres above sea level altitude, are consistently yielding an impressive crop. It is produced by an incredible coffee-passionate community that, through the years, has been driven by a sustainability, productivity and quality learning model. For such a special micro-lot, a team of trained harvesters, mostly women hand pick the ripest and best of the well-tended cherries. After the weighing, sorting and cleaning process, the coffee will undergo careful sun drying on raised beds for about 30 days during which the beans successfully absorb some of the character of the pulp and flavourful cherry skin, giving the coffee a surprising range of cup profiles. As you breathe in the aroma of this amazing wonder in your cup and sip away, remind yourself about the fundamental role

title: Teisseire Gourmet White Chocolate Syrup 700ml
description: Some of the most indulgent flavours our expert team have ever created. Mathieu Teisseire’s white Chocolate syrup is a heart-warming alternative to the dark chocolate classic - delicate and less rich with its subtle vanilla flavour and creamy undertones. The perfect addition to creamy cocktails, especially those that are Martini based as well as indulgent hot chocolates and milkshakes. Enhance Your Water Add a dash to flavour your drink, then adjust to your taste. We prefer to add 1 splash of syrup to 8 of drink for ours. Use me in... Water, Cold Drinks, Alcohol, Hot Drinks. Storage Recommendation Preferably in a dry and cool place, away from heat and light sources. Ingredients Sugar, water, natural flavourings, preservative: E202, acid: citric acid. title: Otis Oat Milk 1L x 2 [Mix & Match]
description: Taste the freshness of quality Kiwi oats, made in New Zealand. Free from dairy, soy, nuts and vegan friendly. I'm Otis Oat M!lk, the barista one. I'm the only oat m!lk made using Kiwi oats. I'm a thick and creamy oat m!lk created especially for a frothy finish, but I’m just as good on muesli and in smoothies too. INGREDIENTS Kiwi oats (10%), water, rapeseed oil, acidity regulator (dipotassium phosphate), minerals (calcium carbonate, calcium phosphates), salt, vitamins (D2, riboflavin, B12). I'm Otis Oat M!lk, the Chocolate one. Made using 100% New Zealand oats and Fairtrade Certified Cocoa, I'm a naughty-but-nice plant based treat! High in calcium and fortified with vitamins D2, B2 and B12, I’m also a yummy source of dietary fibre . INGREDIENTS Water, oats (11%), sugar, rapeseed oil, cocoa (1.2%), minerals (calcium carbonate, calcium phosphates), salt, natural flavour, vitamins (D2, riboflavin, B12). title: Teisseire The Fruits Melon Syrup 700ml
description: Carefully crafted to bring the flavour of the original fruit to any drink you make. Mathieu Teisseire Melon Syrup expertly captures the aromatic profile of ripe, sweet and fragrant Galia melon for a taste that's truly reminiscent of summer. With its fruity aroma and aromatic and authentic flavour, this syrup instantly uplifts sodas, lemonades, cocktails and mocktails as well as milkshakes, frappes and smoothies, too. Enhance Your Water Add a dash to flavour your drink, then adjust to your taste. We prefer to add 1 splash of syrup to 7 of drink for ours. Use me in... Water, Cold Drinks, Alcohol, Hot Drinks. Storage Recommendation Preferably in a dry and cool place, away from heat and light sources. Ingredients Sugar, glucose-fructose syrup, water, fruit juices from concentrates 19.5% (melon 12.5%, lemon 7%), flavouring, colours: E102, E129. Nutrition Typical Values For 100ml Energy (kj/kcal) 1423/335 Carbohydrates (g) 83 of which sugars (g) 76 Salt (g) 0

description: Perfect for creating drinks that offer the unique flavours of herbs and flowers. Mathieu Teisseire Basil Syrup delivers a truly enticing, fresh aroma and a fragrant, herbal flavour. title: Nicaragua 250g
description: SUBSCRIBE & KEY IN "JCBAG50" NOW TO ENJOY 50% OFF! For Limited Season. While stocks last. The Centroamericano H1 Natural originates from Finca La Virgen, Nicaragua. The coffee varieties - complemented by the farm’s 1,000 metres above sea level altitude, are consistently yielding an impressive crop. It is produced by an incredible coffee-passionate community that, through the years, has been driven by a sustainability, productivity and quality learning model. For such a special micro-lot, a team of trained harvesters, mostly women hand pick the ripest and best of the well-tended cherries. After the weighing, sorting and cleaning process, the coffee will undergo careful sun drying on raised beds for about 30 days during which the beans successfully absorb some of the character of the pulp and flavourful cherry skin, giving the coffee a surprising range of cup profiles. As you breathe in the aroma of this amazing wonder in your cup and sip away, remind yourself about the fundamental role

description: SUBSCRIBE & KEY IN "JCBAG50" NOW TO ENJOY 50% OFF! Just as its name suggests, our Lightning Bolt brew packs a vibrant fruity aroma and body. The blend is a perfect marriage between two rich soil areas- Beans from the South of Minas Gerais, Brazil, and beans from the Chanchamayo Valley, Peru, located in the heart of central Amazon rainforest. title: Christmas Hot & Cold Brew Set for Tea Lovers
description: A perfect Christmas gift set for Tea Lovers! Make it Cold Brews iced tea with only tea and water. Put tea bags or tea leaves in the strainer, set it on the spout and slowly pour in water to brew. let the tea infuse the water for 6 to 12 hours in the refrigerator. Before pouring, gently shake the bottle. Unplug the spout and serve. Please drink the tea as soon as possible. After 1 - 2 days the taste will deteriorate, even when stored in a refrigerator. Make it Hot Simply add tea leaves with boiling water, and push the filter down for delicious brewed tea. The press uses a metal mesh filter that is loose enough to allow small tea particles to pass through making for a rich, full body. A variety of teas can be brewed, from classic black teas to herbal teas. The gift set includes: Hario Filter-in Coffee Bottle (5 cups / Brewed volume 650ml) Hario Cafe Press U 600ml Twinings Tea - English Breakfast, Pure Green Tea, Pure Camomile Zerup Zero Sugar Syrup 1L (Choice available)

title: Eureka Adjustable Tamper Black 58mm
description: A perfect tamping experience to any type of palm and hand size. FIT EVERY BARISTA'S HAND: Designed to be user-adjustable and thus offer a perfect tamping experience to any type of palm and hand size. EXTREMELY EASY TO REGULATE: In 4 different heights, thanks to the detachable rings. ANTI-CHANNELING AID: Supporting the barista tamping technique, thanks to the solidity given by its considerable weight more than half kilo. PREMIUM QUALITY AND FINISHES: Stainless steel base generated by precision mechanical processing to ensure premium aesthetics and dimensional quality as well as a reliable long-lasting product. WIDE RANGE OF OPTIONS: Among which several wooden finishes, to create the perfect match with your coffee equipment and Eureka grinders. MATERIALS & DIMENSIONS Metal and rubber tamping base, aluminium handle. Available in 58mm.

title: Christmas Hot & Cold Brew Set for Tea Lovers
description: A perfect Christmas gift set for Tea Lovers! Make it Cold Brews iced tea with only tea and water. Put tea bags or tea leaves in the strainer, set it on the spout and slowly pour in water to brew. let the tea infuse the water for 6 to 12 hours in the refrigerator. Before pouring, gently shake the bottle. Unplug the spout and serve. Please drink the tea as soon as possible. After 1 - 2 days the taste will deteriorate, even when stored in a refrigerator. Make it Hot Simply add tea leaves with boiling water, and push the filter down for delicious brewed tea. The press uses a metal mesh filter that is loose enough to allow small tea particles to pass through making for a rich, full body. A variety of teas can be brewed, from classic black teas to herbal teas. The gift set includes: Hario Filter-in Coffee Bottle (5 cups / Brewed volume 650ml) Hario Cafe Press U 600ml Twinings Tea - English Breakfast, Pure Green Tea, Pure Camomile Zerup Zero Sugar Syrup 1L (Choice available)

title: Teisseire The Specialities Peach Ice Tea Syrup 700ml
description: A taste of something a little more tropical and refreshing. Mathieu Teisseire Peach Iced Tea encapsulates the deliciously juicy, sweet flavours of fresh peach. It's smooth, soft profile is just like perfectly ripe peach flesh. The light citrus finish, beautiful floral aroma and golden orange colour effortlessly elevates a range of teas, sodas, lemonades, beers, cocktails and mocktails. Enhance Your Water Add a dash to flavour your drink, then adjust to your taste. We prefer to add 1 splash of syrup to 8 of drink for ours. Use me in... Water, Cold Drinks, Alcohol, Hot Drinks. Storage Recommendation Preferably in a dry and cool place, away from heat and light sources. Ingredients Glucose-fructose syrup, water, sugar, peach juice from concentrate (10%), acid: citric acid, tea extract, colour: E150B, Flavourings. Nutrition Typical Values For 100ml Energy (kj/kcal) 1426/336 Carbohydrates (g) 82 of which sugars (g) 70 Salt (g) 0.11

title: Teisseire The Specialities Pop Corn Syrup 700ml
description: A taste of something a little more exotic. Mathieu Teisseire Popcorn Syrup expertly recreates the moreish flavour of this much-loved snack. Striking the perfect balance between both salty and sweet, with a mouth-watering roasted aroma, this syrup is the perfect ingredient for adding a fun and innovative twist to your cocktails, mocktails, milkshakes, frappes, coffees and chocolates. Let your imagination run wild! Enhance Your Water Add a dash to flavour your drink, then adjust to your taste. We prefer to add 1 splash of syrup to 7 of drink for ours. Use me in... Water, Cold Drinks, Alcohol, Hot Drinks. Storage Recommendation Preferably in a dry and cool place, away from heat and light sources. Ingredients Sugar, water, preservative: INS 202, citric acid. Contains permitted natural food colours (INS 150a) and natural & artificial flavourings (pop corn, caramel, sugar).
